name: Niki van Stein
content: Niki van Stein - Leiden University Skip to main content Niki van Stein Associate professor artificial intelligence data driven data mining industrial processes kriging machine learning optimization quassian processes surrogate models Name Dr. N. van Stein Telephone +31 71 527 2727 E-mail n.van.stein@liacs.leidenuniv.nl ORCID iD 0000-0002-0013-7969 Niki van Stein is a researcher in the Natural Computing Group of LIACS and manager of the applied data science lab. She received her PhD in Computer Science from Leiden University in 2018. Niki's research interest are in automated machine learning, global (Bayesian) optimization and neural architecture search. More information about Niki van Stein PhD Candidates Kirill Antonov PhD candidate Qi Huang PhD candidate Sofoklis Kitharidis PhD candidate Christiaan Lamers Guest PhD candidate / self funded Fu Xing Long PhD Candidate / Self Funded Bernd Wagner PhD candidate / self funded Alexander Zeiser PhD candidate / guest News 12 August 2025 Award for a method that can create even better algorithms 01 August 2025 New project explores how engineers and AI can truly work together 07 October 2024 Better ship designs thanks to smart algorithms 01 October 2024 Celebrating female computer scientists: ‘Computer science is for everyone’ 14 November 2018 Algorithm Data Science student designs best ship in less time 16 September 2018 PhD on research on an industrial production process See also Link to personal website Niki van Stein is a researcher in the Natural Computing Group of LIACS and manager of the applied data science lab. She received her PhD in Computer Science from Leiden University in 2018. Niki's research interest are in automated machine learning, global (Bayesian) optimization and neural architecture search. Next to her research, Niki has founded several software solution-oriented companies such as Van Stein & Groentjes – Custom software development, and Smartnotation – the smart meeting minutes application. Associate professor Faculty of Science Leiden Inst of Advanced Computer Science Work address Gorlaeus Building Einsteinweg 55 2333 CC Leiden Contact +31 71 527 2727 n.van.stein@liacs.leidenuniv.nl JavaScript is required to view this content.
